itunes:title: Episode 557 - Psychological Social Media Warfare
title: Episode 557 - Psychological Social Media Warfare
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest "The Terrorist Whisperer" Hamody Jasim as he drop new info about Iran and Iraq hiring new heads of media to disseminate anti-American propaganda across all news, televison, and social media platforms ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest "The Terrorist Whisperer" Hamody Jasim as he drop new info about Iran and Iraq hiring new heads of media to disseminate anti-American propaganda across all news, televison, and social media platforms as a way to control their people.  Hamody even gives the names of the organizations as we discuss why this has become the most effective way to keep control in government.
